message: Mexico is not a bad place it depends what you do and who you hang with . . for me I've been to mexicali, Tijuana, guanajuato, Guadalajara, and many more places . . and there's nothing bad going on . . it disappoints me when I ask people have you been to Mexico and they reply no and I'll never go there . . it's scary or I'll get kidnapped by the cartel . . It depends who you know and what you do that causes that attention . . Mexico is a safe beautiful place. <ed> <ed> I'm proud to be 100% Latina <ed> <ed>

Yeah the hate is horrible! I can't believe it is 2016. 75 years ago WW2 Resurgence of close mindedness is so scary. I grieve for people at most risk of abuse & harassment. It is the best of times and the worst of times it seems. Keep you & yours safe and happy.

Strict time schedules? Um...I believe those time schedules can be adjusted and make allowance for ships to not hit and kill a whale or two or a hundred. Maybe hire whale spotters during the migration months, or all year round, to spot and track whales and communicate with the incoming and outgoing ships the long and lat coordinates of the whales. Just an out there what if thought. The lack of decency and common sense of some individuals is appalling. Adjusting time schedules...Not rocket science. All creatures great and small have the right to life. Holy Moby Dick Batman!
